long_description: T2+(TM) S-Bend extension bar is ideal for aggressive positioning for time-trials and triathlons. MULTI-FIT System(TM) fits 26.0mm and 31.8mm bars. Lightweight and strong 6061-T6 aluminum extensions and forged brackets. Includes length, width and rotational extension adjustments. "J" Brackets(TM) provide a lower arm position. F-19(TM) armrests have length and rotational adjustments. Shot-peened, anodized finish adds strength and durability. Dual cable routing holes allow optional internal cable routing. Attractive matte-black finish.
short_description: T2+(TM) S-Bend extension bar is ideal for aggressive positioning for time-trials and triathlons.
